QuestData.Title: The Abandoned Reach
QuestData.Description: We have just gotten word from Liandra that mercenaries hired by Nesingwary are moving goods off the beach and onto the main Nesingwary shipping vessel. No doubt they plan on making a fortune from their murderous trade!$B$BShe has asked that we send assistance to the Abandoned Reach, directly south of here on the beachfront of the Borean Tundra.$B$BMake haste, Liandra awaits you there!
QuestData.LogDescription: Seek out Hierophant Liandra at the Abandoned Reach.
QuestData.RewardText: Cenius sent you? Well you're not a moment too soon!
